summary.overview: This JCL compiles and builds a CICS DB2 program for the CARDDEMO application system. It creates the necessary executable components to enable CICS transaction processing with DB2 database access.
business_functions: Compile CICS DB2 program source code for CARDDEMO application
Build executable load module for CICS transaction processing
Generate database request module for DB2 access

CICDBCMP.jcl.program_overview: CICS DB2 program for CARDDEMO application processing

datasource_summary.name: COBOL Source Code Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.CBL)
datasource_summary.function: Contains COBOL source code for the CICSDB2P program that needs to be compiled

datasource_summary.name: COBOL Copybook Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.CPY)
datasource_summary.function: Contains COBOL copybooks that are referenced and included during the compilation process

datasource_summary.name: DB2 Declaration Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.DCL)
datasource_summary.function: Contains DB2 DCLGEN declarations that define database table structures used during compilation

datasource_summary.name: Load Module Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.LOADLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Stores the compiled executable load module that can be executed in the CICS environment

datasource_summary.name: Database Request Module Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.DBRMLIB)
datasource_summary.function: Stores the DB2 Database Request Module (DBRM) which contains SQL statements that will be bound to the DB2 plan CARDDEMO

datasource_summary.name: Compilation Procedure Library (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PROC.UTIL)
datasource_summary.function: Contains the BLDCIDB2 procedure that defines the compilation steps for CICS DB2 programs

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    CICSDB2P["CICS DB2 program for CARDDEMO application processing (CICSDB2P) "]
